Get a list of Citations

get.citations.Rd

Creates a list of citations included in the database.

get.citations(ver = "upd")

Arguments

ver

Version of the database. Default is upd, for the latest version.

Value

A data frame containing citations for all references included the database.

Examples

get.citations()

#>                             Citation
#> 1             Harner and Mackay 1995
#> 2           Harner and Bidleman 1996
#> 3                Finizio et al. 1997
